text: WASHINGTON U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi on Wednesday said Democrats and the Trump administration remained far apart regarding any agreement over further economic aid amid the novel coronavirus pandemic, saying Republicans also seemed divided amongst themselves over relief efforts.Were miles apart, the U.S. House of Representatives top Democrat told MSNBC in an interview, citing education funding in particular, among other needs. Its a chasm ... but as a practical matter, theyre going to have to come to the table.
